permissions: User must be an admin or a manager member of the broker (buyer) on the commitment.
side_effects: Updates a broker commitment record and/or its relationships.
validation_notes: At least one updatable flag must be provided. Status must be one of editing, active, inactive when set. --label, --notes, and --truck-scope accept empty strings to clear those fields. Buyer must be a broker and seller must be a trucker. Buyer and seller must have the same broker. truck_scope must belong to the buyer or seller organization. tons and tons_per_shift must be absent.

flags.name: --label
flags.description: Commitment label (empty string to clear). Example: --label "Q2".

flags.name: --notes
flags.description: Notes (empty string to clear). Example: --notes "Revised scope".

flags.name: --truck-scope
flags.description: Truck scope ID (empty string to clear).
